text: I would recommend to put the graphics further down your list. It's a lot more important to get the game fundamentals working first. You can use placeholders for the graphics.

Here a few questions I would try to answer first (which also gives you some sort of outline for the report)
 - what kind of maze do you want to create?
 - how do you play the game? what's the start and what's the goal?
 - how do you make mazes more difficult?
[note, no programming related questions so far but just concepts]
 - how do you generate such a maze? or do you create them manually?
[not really programming either yet]
 - how can you represent the maze in <http://vb.net|vb.net>? I mean the internal format, not the visuals.
 - how can you "draw" a maze with <http://vb.net|vb.net>?
 -
Hadn't thought about it that much yet.... now I'm so lost and confused..
